name: org_slug
description: Unique organization identifier (Multi-tenancy ID). Example: 'guru_inc_123'.

name: id
description: Unique primary key for this hierarchy record. UUID format.

name: entity_type
description: Type of hierarchy entity. Values: 'department', 'project', 'team'.

name: entity_id
description: Unique identifier for this entity within its type. Example: 'DEPT-001', 'PROJ-001', 'TEAM-001'.

name: entity_name
description: Human-readable name for the entity. Example: 'Engineering', 'Platform', 'Backend'.

name: parent_id
description: Entity ID of the parent in hierarchy. NULL for departments (top-level). Projects reference dept_id, teams reference project_id.

name: parent_type
description: Entity type of parent. Values: NULL (for dept), 'department' (for project), 'project' (for team).

name: dept_id
description: Department ID this entity belongs to. Set for all entity types. Self-reference for departments.

name: dept_name
description: Denormalized department name for query convenience.

name: project_id
description: Project ID this entity belongs to. NULL for departments, self-reference for projects, parent for teams.

name: project_name
description: Denormalized project name for query convenience.

name: team_id
description: Team ID. Only set for team entities (self-reference).

name: team_name
description: Denormalized team name for query convenience.

name: owner_id
description: Unique identifier for the entity owner. Can be user ID or email.

name: owner_name
description: Full name of the entity owner.

name: owner_email
description: Email address of the entity owner for notifications.

name: description
description: Optional description of the entity purpose.

name: metadata
description: Flexible JSON field for custom attributes.

name: is_active
description: Whether this entity is currently active. Inactive entities are hidden from UI.

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when this record was created.

name: created_by
description: User ID or email of the creator.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp of the last update.

name: updated_by
description: User ID or email of the last updater.

name: version
description: Version number for optimistic locking and history tracking.

name: end_date
description: Timestamp when this version ended. NULL for current active version.
